headline: Is Arch Capital Group Still Attractive After Its Strong Multi Year Share Price Surge?
summary: Wondering if Arch Capital Group is still a smart buy after such a strong run, or if the easy money has already been made? This article will walk through what the current price really implies about its value. The stock closed at $96.20 recently, and while the 7 day return of 2.4%, 30 day return of 5.5% and 1 year gain of 5.7% are solid, the real story is the 59.6% 3 year and 190.2% 5 year performance that has many investors reassessing both upside and risk.
